Lithium has been reported as a potential antiviral drug for certain viruses, and several of them are members of coronavide family. Hong-Jie reported that lithium inhibited in vitro the entry and replication of the porcine epidemic diarrhea (PEDV) coronavirus in Vero cells [1]. The expresión of viral RNA and protein of PEDV in Vero cells was suprpressed in a dose-dependent manner by lithium. Moreover lithium inhibited early and late apoptosis induced by PEDV. Sally M Harrison reported the efectiveness of lithium inhibiting in two model of cell types, the coronavirus bronchitis virus [2], and these findings were refrended by Jing Li et al [3].

Lithium has been used for decades in the treatment of several mental illness, and today is a cheap, safe, well known, and widely spread drug. I sugest that epidemilogical studies should be developed to figure out the incidence of COVID-19 in people treated with this drug, and in the case of favorable results, considerer lithium as a posible treatment for new outbreack.
